channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiWLM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiWLM

item.title: CVE-2023-48782|2023-12-13T06:37:42.217Z -- fortinet -- fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an os command ('os command injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specifically crafted http get request parameters

item.title: CVE-2023-36549|2023-10-10T16:50:59.929Z -- fortinet -- fortiwlm
item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an os command ('os command injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 and 8.5.0 through 8.5.4 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via specifically crafted http get request parameters.

item.title: CVE-2023-42783|2023-11-14T18:04:50.699Z -- fortinet -- fortiwlm
item.description: A relative path traversal in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 and 8.5.0 through 8.5.4 and 8.4.2 through 8.4.0 and 8.3.2 through 8.3.0 and 8.2.2 allows attacker to read arbitrary files via crafted http requests.

item.description: A improper neutralization of special elements used in an sql command ('sql injection') in Fortinet FortiWLM version 8.6.0 through 8.6.5 and 8.5.0 through 8.5.4 and 8.4.0 through 8.4.2 and 8.3.0 through 8.3.2 and 8.2.2 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via a crafted http request.
